howItWorks.title: How It Works
steps: 1. Upload your image or drag & drop
2. Our AI automatically detects the subject

items.question: How is this better than Inkscape?
items.answer: Unlike Inkscape which requires manual selection and complex tutorials, our tool uses AI to automatically detect and remove backgrounds in seconds.

items.question: Is it really free?
items.answer: Yes! Completely free with no limits, no watermarks, and no sign-up required.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. Output is always a transparent PNG.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Absolutely! All processing happens locally in your browser. Your images never leave your device.
